title: Spanish tomato bread
description: A classic catalan dish that’s very simple and easy to prepare but totally more-ish. Add to a tapas selection. This bread, if served as 8 slices, provides 209kcal, 7g protein, 34g carbohydrate (of which 2g sugars), 4.5g fat (of which 0.5g saturates), 2g fibre and 1g salt per portion.
ingredients: 1 loaf sourdough bread (or any crusty dense white bread), sliced into 6-8 thick slices
